column5: STAF Added 1000 shares here towards the close Have a great weekend everyone
My new swing positions KXIN ZKIN PTI STAF

STAF The overall market and a small stock like STAF do NOT trade together Literally a different largely independent universe Anybody who thinks they are connected Day to day will be taught by the market and their portfolio balance that they were wrongI trade my regular SP stocks totally different then the handful of micro stocks I have The Micros never represent more then 10 of my investments and I am never have more then 110 in one micro stock because any one of them could go to zeroand they have They are more like lottery tickets that sometimes they pay off big like recently ELTK sold all yesterday or SOLY still holding but will sell todayI am actually a bit disappointed in STAF hoped last QER would push stock towards 3I will wait one more Qtr
STAF looking pretty red in market Looking for 158 to add on to my position One of these days news will come I like that this dont move when markets down
STAF who was telling green we got in to red
STAF just bought more at these levels
STAF Market is deep red and this is green its a sign of good things to come IMHO
STAF lets break up Its coming soon
